Enable Root
Enabling root will reveal the root folder shortcut in the nav drawer and give you access to the root of your device.
Disabling root will hide the root folder shortcut in the nav drawer and prevent you from accessing the root of your device.
Show Hidden Files
Disabling will hide files and folders marked as hidden from you.
Enabling will make files and folders marked as hidden visible to you.
Sorting
